channel.title: I18n on Vanilla Forums Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in I18n on Vanilla Forums Documentation

item.title: {t}
item.description: Function: {t} Usage {t c="string" d="string"} Output a translatable string with an optional default. Parameters Parameter Type Default Description c string none The string to output or a string short-name d string $c Default translation. Good idea to set when using short-names
